text: The Detroit Pulaski Post Five were an American basketball team based in Detroit, Michigan that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team became known as the Detroit Lions after the beginning of the 1926/27 season and dropped out of the league after 6 games in that season. ==Year-by- year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1925/26 |ABL |8th (1st half); 8th (2nd half) |Did not qualify |- |1926/27 |ABL |N/A |N/A |} Category:Basketball teams in Detroit
title: Detroit Pulaski
